data.eml:eml: Inocellia indica sp. nov. (Raphidioptera: Inocelliidae): a new snakefly species from northeastern India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xingyue, Hajong, Sudhanya Ray (2015): Inocellia indica sp. nov. (Raphidioptera: Inocelliidae): a new snakefly species from northeastern India. Zootaxa 4040 (3): 393-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.3.10
